short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore how Chrome Verified Access API can be used to verify your Chromebook users and/or devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension demonstrates the process of authenticating a ChromeBook device or user with the Chrome Verified Access API.
You may install it if you plan to develop a custom Chrome extension to authenticate ChromeBook users and/or devices on your websites or network services.
You'll find more details on this extension here: https://github.com/jnury/verified-access-extension
